title: Japanese Graded Readers Level.1-Vol.1.zip
description:
Hello!

Just wanted to share with you the Japanese Graded Readers, Level 1, Volume 1 (5 books + Audio).

These books are great for beginners in Japanese because they come with a CD and all the Kanji (and the katakana) have furigana. You just need to know the hiragana. The books are illustrated and contain traditional japanese stories. 

I did my best to give you nice scans so you can enjoy reading them.
The audio has been extracted with Itunes so I hope it won't cause any problem to you.

It's the first time I'm making a torrent file so let me know if it doesn't work.

Take care!
